description: Full hydraulic ISOBUS auto-steer with OEM-level valve integration
tractor_compatibility: JD 6R/7R/8R/9R - Case IH Magnum/Steiger - NH T7/T8/T9 - Fendt 700/900/1000 - Claas Axion
key_features: Full hydraulic via OEM valves - ISOBUS compatible - sub-inch with RTK - no aftermarket valve kit

description: Motor-on-column steering for tractors without hydraulic valve access
tractor_compatibility: Universal - JD / Case IH / NH / Fendt / MF / Kubota / Claas / Challenger
key_features: Motor-on-column - compact design - high torque motor - ISOBUS

description: ISOBUS steering controller ECU for integration with any ISOBUS display
tractor_compatibility: Pairs with PSR ISO or PSR Top systems
key_features: ISOBUS TC-GEO - works with any ISOBUS UT display - multi-brand compatible

description: Model-specific hydraulic valve kit for John Deere tractor integration
key_features: Taps into JD factory steering hydraulics - no drilling or permanent modification

description: Model-specific hydraulic valve kit for Case IH and New Holland
tractor_compatibility: Case IH Magnum / Steiger - NH T7 / T8 / T9
key_features: Taps into CNH factory steering hydraulics - reversible install

description: Model-specific hydraulic valve kit for Fendt / MF / Challenger
key_features: Taps into AGCO factory steering hydraulics - reversible install

description: Model-specific hydraulic valve kit for Claas tractors
key_features: Taps into Claas factory steering hydraulics - no permanent modification

description: High-precision wheel angle sensor for steering feedback
tractor_compatibility: Universal - fits any tractor with MFWD front axle
key_features: Contactless sensor - high resolution - required for hydraulic auto-steer

description: Active implement steering for towed planters and drills
tractor_compatibility: Towed implements with hydraulic hitch cylinders
key_features: Hydraulic implement steering - row tracking on contours and hillsides

description: Steering knob controller for manual guidance assistance
tractor_compatibility: Universal - fits any tractor steering wheel
key_features: Haptic feedback knob - guides operator along A-B line - low-cost option
connectivity: CAN bus / pairs with ISOBUS display
